      • acceptSAs

        public static void acceptSAs(LinkedList<Integer> ids)
        Changes the status of the given S.A.s to accepted.
        Parameters:
        ids - A linked list with the ids of the S.A.s to accept.

      • geSAWithResults

        public static LinkedList<String> geSAWithResults()
        Retrieves a list with S.A.s which have some results in the database.
        Returns:
        A linked list with the hashes of the S.A.s.

      • getAcceptedSAInfo

        public static LinkedList<SAInfoStatus> getAcceptedSAInfo()
        Retrieves from the database the info for every accepted S.A..
        Returns:
        Returns a linked list with the S.A. status and info.

      • getOnlineSAInfo

        public static LinkedList<SAInfoStatus> getOnlineSAInfo()
        Retrieves from the database all the info for only the online S.A.s.
        Returns:
        A linked list the S.A. info.

      • getPendReg

        public static LinkedList<SA> getPendReg()
        Retrieves from database the registrations that are still pending for their acceptance.
        Returns:
        A linked list with all the pending registrations at this time.

      • getPeriodicJobsOfSA

        public static LinkedList<JobPrev> getPeriodicJobsOfSA(String curSA)
        Retrieves from database the periodic jobs for a specific S.A..
        Parameters:
        curSA - The S.A. for which to retrieve the jobs.
        Returns:
        A linked list of periodic jobs for the given S.A..

      • getResultsOfSABetweenTime

        public static LinkedList<String> getResultsOfSABetweenTime(String saHash,
                                                           long sTime,
                                                           long eTime,
                                                           boolean forAll)
        Retrieves from the database the jobs results of a specific S.A. or for all the S.A.s for a specific time.
        Parameters:
        saHash - The S.A. for which to retrieve the results. It will be disposed if the function is used for all the S.A.s.
        sTime - The starting time from which to retrieve the results.
        eTime - The ending time until which to retrieve the results.
        forAll - True to retrieve results for every S.A.. False for a specific S.A..
        Returns:
        A linked list with the XMLs of the results.
